EmailTemplate.name: SE London NCS Ambassador Opportunities
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Opportunities to be an NCS Ambassador!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
As an active member of our graduate programme we have some exclusive opportunities for you to be involved in over the coming weeks!
1. NCS Ambassador Phone Party:
Get trained on top customer service tips; Get on the phone to upcoming NCS 2016 participants; Use your experience to get them excited for the summer!
The Phone Parties are happening next week on Wednesday 1st of June and Thursday 2nd of June from 14:00 - 17:00 in The Challenge offices in Waterloo.
There are only 10 spaces per day and will be offered on a first come first served basis. As a thank you there will be a supply of pizza!
Click here to sign up now!
2. NCS 2016 Information Evenings:
Share you NCS experience with the parents/guardians of upcoming 2016 participants; Let them know all about your time on the programme and what their young person can expect; Practise your public speaking and communication skills!
Information Evenings take place on a regular basis throughout the summer. If you would like to sign up to an event from early - mid June you can!
Click here to sign up now!
Thanks to everyone who has helped spread the word of NCS already this year. We hope to see you again soon!
The Challenge Society
